title: Pharaoh

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - While dead, select a player who has received your curse. The amount of nights they have left before they die is reduced by one. If this would reduce it to 0, they die that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Upon dying, all of your visitors that night are informed they have gained the Pharaoh’s Curse.
- After 3 nights after receiving the Pharaoh’s Curse, a player will be dealt an astral unstoppable attack, ignoring protective and healing abilities.
- You learn the names and roles of all your visitors the night you die
- If you were attacked directly by a player, they die after 1 night instead of 3.
